mapper.select: select distinct A.id, A.identifier, A.name, A.description, A.activated from (select * from tb_sys_role_auth where role_id=#{roleId}) RA inner join tb_sys_auth A on RA.auth_id=A.id

select distinct A.id, A.identifier, A.name, A.description, A.activated from (select * from tb_sys_user_role where user_id=#{userId}) UR inner join tb_sys_role R on UR.role_id=R.id and R.activated=1 inner join tb_sys_role_auth RA on UR.role_id=RA.role_id inner join tb_sys_auth A on RA.auth_id=A.id and A.activated=1
